expo.name: Help Her Take Photo
expo.description: Your relationship's photography insurance. Save your relationship one photo at a time! Connect devices so your partner can guide your camera framing in real-time. Features multi-language support, gamification with 'scoldings saved' stats, and a shared photo gallery.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access so you can take photos for your partner
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to save and share photos
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs permission to save photos to your library
infoPlist.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This app uses local network to connect with your partner's device

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Help Her Take Photo to access your camera

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Help Her Take Photo to access your photos
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Help Her Take Photo to save photos

plugins.cameraPermissionText: $(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your camera for taking photos
